scenes.background: Bob rubs his temples, looking frustrated, while Monica taps her pen on the table.
scenes.description: Monica says, 'How do we manage with this constant back and forth?'

options.text: Perhaps we need to establish clearer guidelines to streamline our decision-making.
options.analysis: You suggest a structured approach, showing good perception and empathy while maintaining social harmony.

options.text: I think sticking to a more flexible strategy could help us adapt better.
options.analysis: You lean towards adaptability, showing good self-regulation and motivation, but less empathy and social skills.

options.text: We should just pick one method and stick to it, even if it's not perfect.
options.analysis: You suggest a decisive approach, showing good social skills and motivation, but less perception and empathy.
